entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 2:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of drizzle. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
